title: Video: Heems – Desi Shoegaze Taiko
body:
httpv://www.

youtube.com/watch?v=wMwUo7\_Avhs

[Heems](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/artist/heems/), the ex-Das Racist rapper, has just posted a link to video for the song ‘Desi Shoegaze Taiko’, a cut from his first mixtape, _Nehru Jackets. _The video, which was uploaded to youtube on Dapwell’s account, consists of a slightly time-warped beginning of the Wesley Snipes opus, _Blade._ Honestly, that’s the whole video.

I have to say, it’s an odd move, considering that his second mixtape, _Wild Water Kingdom_ has been out for months, but one that I find heartening. ‘Desi Shoegaze Taiko’ is not, in my opinion, one of Heems’ best songs, but neither is it the worst. I find it impossible to take any kind of issue with a rap song that samples Yuck though and I do adore the fact that Heems, most likely deliberately, is messing with the public’s expectations just for lulz.

Heems has a tour of the UK planned soon, details of which you can find [here](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/19462-news-first-uk-solo-show-for-heems-since-das-racist-breakup/). Happy Friday folks!
